text:
(Added by Ord. 182-89, App. 6/5/89; amended by Ord. 374-90, App. 11/16/90; Ord. 298-97, App. 7/25/97)
SEC. 10.169-8.  RESERVED.
Editor's Note:
     Ord. 249-07 repealed former Sec. 10.169-8, which pertained to Cash Revolving Funds – Residential Rent Stabilization and Arbitration Board; $100. 
(Added by Ord. 282-90, App. 7/24/90; amended by Ord. 298-97, App. 7/25/97; repealed by Ord. 249-07, File No. 071329, App. 11/7/2007)

heading.catch_text: CASH REVOLVING FUNDS – ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES, ANIMAL CARE AND CONTROL; $2,000.
